oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New wideband monopole antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: AGRAWALL, NP
KUMAR, G
RAY, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several new wideband configurations, such as, elliptical, square, rectangular, and hexagonal disc monopole antennas have been fabricated and results have been compared with the reported circular disc monopole antenna. The elliptical disc with ellipticity ratio of 1.1 yields the largest bandwidth from 1.21 GHz, to more than 13 GRz for VSWR < 2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IEEE ANTENNAS AND PROPAGATION SOCIETY INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM 1997, VOLS 1-4,248-251
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: IEEE Antennas-and-Propagation-Society International Symposium / North American Radio Science Meeting,MONTREAL, CANADA,JUL 13-18, 1997
